title: Find cloud hosting, software and support
line1: Before you start you should write a list of requirements and
line2: check if you need approval to spend money on a service.
line3: You cannot run step 2 and 3 at the same time.
line4: Check the terms and conditions of this lot in the

sections: You can save your search results and export your results later. You must buy fairly and assess all the services that you find. Do not combine the results of more than one search.

Follow the guidance for assessing services. Choose the one that best meets your budget and requirements.

Do not hold a competition to decide the winner. You can contact suppliers to ask clarification questions,
but you must not negotiate with them.
Follow the guidance for awarding a contract.
You can use this G-Cloud 13 call-off contract template if you need to...

Check if you need to publish the details on Contracts Finder. Whether you award a contract or not, tell us
the outcome. This information helps us improve your experience.

content.text: Digital Specialists and Programmes, Lot 2: Specialists
